frameDefinitions: A Communicator announces (linguistically or non-linguistically) the  imminent arrival of an Individual or the occurrence of an Event.
An Entity comes into existence at a particular Place and Time which may take a certain Duration_of_endstate, have a Cause, or be formed from Components.
An Entity is understood to be experienceable within a particular set of delimited Circumstances, which may be more narrowly expressed by a Time, Place.
In this frame an Emission emanates from a Source along a Path or to a Goal.
An Entity exists at a particular Location, at a particular Time, as observed by an implicit observer.
An Entity that is previously not visible to a Perceiver becomes visible.
frameExamples: The unveiling of Alinghi's keel was <t>heralded</t> by alp horns
Problems may <t>arise</t> whenever an S1 sophont enters the game.
This type of behavior <t>occurs</t> in several primate mating rituals.
Liquid water was <t>present</t> on the surface of Mars billions of years ago.
The armada <t>appeared</t> on the horizon at sunset.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Communicator</fen> greets the arrival of an <fen>Individual</fen> or occurrence of an <fen>Event</fen>.
The person who is greeted at their arrival by the <fen>Communicator</fen>.
The occurrence which is greeted by the <fen>Communicator</fen>.
The symbol-containing artifact whereby a <fen>Communicator</fen> heralds.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Communicator</fen>  heralds.
This role identifies the place where the Communicator heralds.
Concrete or abstract entity that did not exist before the <fen>Time</fen> of the event.
This role identifes the Time when a new Entity comes into existence.
This is the Place where the new Entity comes into being.
An object or event that is described as being available under delimited Conditions.
A temporal characterization of the circumstances of the existence of an <fen>Entity</fen>.
A spacial characterization of the <fex name=''>Circumstances</fex> of the existence of the <fex name=''>Entity</fex>.
A description of the state of the world in which the <fen>Entity</fen> can be experienced.
The <fen>Emission</fen>s are discharged out of the <fen>Source</fen> .
The <fen>Source</fen> is the location from which the <fen>Emission</fen> emanates.
This role identifies the time when the emanation occurs.
The <fen>Entity</fen> whose existence at the <fen>Location</fen> is confirmed.
The <fen>Location</fen> of the <fen>Entity</fen>. The <fen>Location</fen> is conceived as a ground for an event of inspection to determine the presense of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Entity</fen> is present at the <fen>Location</fen>.
The thing that the <fen>Perceiver</fen> is able to see or recognize.
A temporal description of the event of the <fen>Entity</fen> becoming visible.
The physical location in which the <fen>Entity</fen> becomes visible.
listRoleExamples: Sheep scattered from the road as trumpets heralded <fex>his arrival at the castle gates</fex>

passageCandidateSpans.text: the Choctaw Nation approved pursuant to Section 2 of the Act of April 26, 1906
Article II Section I of the constitution

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Department of Health and Human Services
